pullRequest.title: JBPM-8984 Default runtime strategy of 'New Deployment Unit' wizard sh…
pullRequest.bodyText: …ould respect kie-deployment-descriptor.xml when manually inputting GAV

nodes.bodyText: Perhaps use something like: GAV '{0}' not found in the Maven repository
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -147,3 +147,4 @@ ClientContainerRuntimeOperation.StopScanner=Stop Scanner
 ContainerUpdateEvent.ErrorMessage=The '{0}' operation has failed in {1} server instance(s).
 ContainerUpdateEvent.WarnMessage=The '{0}' operation may have failed in some of the {1} server instance(s).
 ContainerUpdateEvent.SuccessMessage=The '{0}' operation has succeeded, {1} server instances were affected.
+NewContainer.GAVNotExist=not exist.

nodes.bodyText: @bxf12315  If we launch here DependencyPathSelectedEvent with the param isselected = true allows to respect the changes done at Runtime Strategy configuration changed by the user throw the wizard. I think the behaviour would be more consistent with the one that is performed when a kjar is selected from list. WDYT?
